description: This is some form of unnatural changeling creature; its appearance is a bland mockery of the human form.  Featureless and pale, its repugnant countenance is all the more unsettling due to its lack of eyes and distinguishing features except for a perfectly round mouth.  Adding to its unearthly appearance is the way it moves, stiff and doll-like as though it was only feigning knowing how to walk.

death_function.message: The %s stiffens and falls apart into fragments.
